org.hari10.com.ws.rest.ErrorDTO

    Package Description
    org.hari10.com.ws.rest
    Package for Spring MVC webservices REST controllers.

    • Uses of ErrorDTO in org.hari10.com.ws.rest

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ErrorDTO BaseRestController.handleConstraintViolationExceptions(javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles error when save/update results in constraint violation in database.
      ErrorDTO BaseRestController.handleEntityNotFoundExceptions(javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles exception if entity is not found in the system.
      ErrorDTO BaseRestController.handleExceptions(Exception exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles all unknown unexpected exception that can happen during WS call.
      ErrorDTO BaseRestController.handleJPAEntityNotFoundExceptions(javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException exception, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Handles exception if entity is not found in database.
